# Advanced Topic A

This document explores advanced concepts in Topic A.

## Prerequisites

You should be familiar with the basics from [note1](./note1.md).

## Advanced Patterns

### Pattern 1: Configuration

Configure your setup:

```yaml
config:
  enabled: true
  level: advanced
```

### Pattern 2: Integration

Integrate with other systems.
